plot: Mark and co. crash a Blue Hand/ghost gathering to investigate recent suicides. Aaron meets a man who was with the daughter when she died. Demetri tells Zoey about his "vision".

Mark, Demetri, Gough and MI6 agent Fiona Banks investigate a Blue Hand club and its possible connection to some recent suicides. Meanwhile, Aaron receives a surprise visit from a former army buddy of his late daughter's, Demetri comes clean with Zoey about his lack of a flashforward, and Nicole helps Bryce uncover the mystery of his flashforward while volunteering at the hospital.—ABC Publicity
